summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Salah Reminder application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality works well with minor UI flow issues in registration dialogs.

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog navigation flow has timeout issues after successful registration

design_issues.issue: Missing aria-describedby attributes causing accessibility warnings

passed_tests: Prayer times from Aladhan API integration
Manual prayer times setting by admin
Admin registration with ID proof upload
Community post creation and approval workflow
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix registration dialog flow timeout issue and add missing aria-describedby attributes for better accessibility. Consider improving error handling in registration success/failure states.
